subject: Football
College Athletics
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Armanti Edwards’s 5-yard touchdown run with just over a minute left put Appalachian State ahead yesterday, and its defense made a late fumble recovery in a 28-27 victory against visiting James Madison in the first round of the Football Championship Subdivision playoffs.
